subject: Soccer
Algarve Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Solo helped preserve a 2-0 victory over France on Wednesday in Portugal as the United States won the tournament, which featured nine teams bound for the Women’s World Cup.
snippet: Solo helped preserve a 2-0 victory over France on Wednesday in Portugal as the United States won the tournament, which featured nine teams bound for the Women’s World Cup.
